summary: This is an automated out-of-office email reply from an individual at the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USAO SDNY). It indicates the sender will be on leave the week of December 28, 2020, and provides contact instructions for urgent matters. The email's subject line references a New York Daily News article about Jeffrey Epstein's final days in jail.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject line of the forwarded email/article references an investigation into his final days at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York City.

events.title: Automatic Reply Email Sent
events.description: An automatic out-of-office reply is sent from an email address at the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.

keyFacts: The document is an automatic email reply from an individual at the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USAO SDNY).
The email's subject references a New York Daily News article titled 'Jeffrey Epstein's final days at NYC jail revealed by inmates'.
The sender was on leave the week of December 28, 2020, suggesting ongoing work or communication related to the Epstein case at that time.
The document identifier 'EFTA00097635' is included in the email signature/body.
